channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: The Man Who Knew Too Much
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (John D. Swain)
item.description: Consulting alientest Arbuthnot was used to strange tales from his patients. But when the last patient of the day told him, "I know too much," he had no idea that the man was telling the truth …
